Then:I was a wife.Married to a man who was my world and the father of my child. Then, one day, half of my heart was ripped out of my chest.Now:Iâ€™m a widow.A single mom who has spent the last nine months trying like hell not to drown in an ocean of grief.I survive in the in-between, but surviving isn't the same as living, and Iâ€™m not sure what living looks like anymore.That is, until Jase Turner, my older brotherâ€™s best friend and my former crush, comes back into my life.Weâ€™re two people tethered together by strands of similar sorrow.My husband had my past.Jase wants my future.ğ‘¨ğ’ğ’… ğ’ğ’‚ğ’šğ’ƒğ’† ğ’˜ğ’‰ğ’†ğ’“ğ’† ğ’‡ğ’ğ’“ğ’†ğ’—ğ’†ğ’“ ğ’†ğ’ğ’…ğ’” ğ’Šğ’” ğ’‹ğ’–ğ’”ğ’• ğ’‚ ğ’…ğ’Šğ’‡ğ’‡ğ’†ğ’“ğ’†ğ’ğ’• ğ’ƒğ’†ğ’ˆğ’Šğ’ğ’ğ’Šğ’ğ’ˆ.
